statements: UPDATE luxury_accommodations SET price = 5000, available_units = 10 WHERE accommodation_id = 1;
UPDATE luxury_accommodations SET booked_units = 5, accommodation_type = 'Villa' WHERE accommodation_id = 3;
UPDATE luxury_accommodations SET price = 500.00, available_units = 10 WHERE accommodation_id = 1;
UPDATE luxury_accommodations SET booked_units = booked_units + 1, price = price * 1.1 WHERE accommodation_name = 'Luxury Suite';
UPDATE Villas SET price = 2000.00 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Resorts SET rating = 4.5, available_rooms = 10 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Villas SET price = 5000, bedrooms = 4 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Resorts SET total_rooms = total_rooms + 10, rating = 4.7 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Villas SET price = 5000.00 WHERE villa_id = 1;
UPDATE Resorts SET rating = 4.5, price = 7000.00 WHERE resort_id = 3;
UPDATE Villas SET price = 1500.00, capacity = 10, location = 'Tropical Paradise' WHERE villa_id = 101;
UPDATE Resorts SET rating = 4.5, price = 2000.00, location = 'Mountain View' WHERE resort_name = 'Mountain Retreat';
UPDATE villas SET price = 1500.00, bedrooms = 3 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE resorts SET rating = 4, amenities = ARRAY['pool', 'spa'] WHERE id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE villas SET price = 3000, bedrooms = 5 WHERE id = 'cc514c23-ec6b-4624-b378-48aa5d3972bd';
UPDATE private_islands SET available = false, size_acres = 20.5 WHERE id = '3d1b627f-5d29-4c01-8173-9c46a4b9f728';
UPDATE villas SET rate = 500.00, availability = true WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE resorts SET rating = 4.5, has_spa = true, rooms = 50 WHERE name = 'Luxury Resort';
UPDATE villas SET availability = false WHERE rooms >= 5;
UPDATE resorts SET rating = 4.5, has_spa = true WHERE location = 'Tropical Island';
